attributes.action: Pay increase and help with mileage costs for community carers.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to help the carers in social care receive a decent wage and help with mileage as the cost of petrol and cost of living increases as there is a shortage of carers and there is difficulty in recruiting new staff due to the low pay and the high cost of petrol.
attributes.background: To give carers a higher rate of pay and increase the mileage allowance.

rejection.details:
The pay and conditions of private carers is a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

You might like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

Increase the HMRC Mileage Rate from 45p/mile to 60p/mile: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600966

Exempt registered care workers from council tax, while employed as a carer: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616542
